    • sqlLogin

      public static int sqlLogin​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Rsponse about the get the role or the loggedin user
      Parameters:
      username - the username from the login page
      password - the password from the login page
      Returns:
      the role_id ( 1 Manager, 2 Worker, 3 Volunteer, 4 Customer)
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • sqlAddCustomerByHimSelf

      public static void sqlAddCustomerByHimSelf​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String birthday, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String motherLanguage, java.lang.String residencePermit, java.lang.String street, java.lang.String number, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String post_code, java.lang.String high_school, java.lang.String university, java.lang.String integration_course, java.lang.String dsh_course, java.lang.String german_level)
      Respone about add new User to the DB when he register by him Self
      Parameters:
      firstName - the firstname of the new user
      lastName - the lastname of the new user
      birthday - the birthday of the new uuser
      gender - the gender of the new user
      email - the email of the new user
      userName - the username of the new user
      password - the password of the new user
      country - the country of the new user
      motherLanguage - the mother language of the new user
      residencePermit - the residence permit type of the new user
      street - the home_street of the new user
      number - the house number of the new user
      city - the cuty of the new user
      post_code - the post code of the new user
      high_school - if the new user has high school
      university - if he study in the university
      integration_course - if he has integration course certificate
      dsh_course - if he has DSH certificate
      german_level - what is his German level

    • sqlAddUserByManager

      public static void sqlAddUserByManager​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String birthday, java.lang.String gender, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String motherLanguage, java.lang.String residencePermit, java.lang.String street, java.lang.String number, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String post_code, java.lang.String high_school, java.lang.String university, java.lang.String integration_course, java.lang.String dsh_course, java.lang.String german_level, java.lang.String roleType)
      Response about add user to DB when someone add him
      Parameters:
      firstName - the firstname of the new user
      lastName - the lastname of the new user
      birthday - the birthday of the new uuser
      gender - the gender of the new user
      email - the email of the new user
      userName - the username of the new user
      password - the password of the new user
      country - the country of the new user
      motherLanguage - the mother language of the new user
      residencePermit - the residence permit type of the new user
      street - the home_street of the new user
      number - the house number of the new user
      city - the cuty of the new user
      post_code - the post code of the new user
      high_school - if the new user has high school
      university - if he study in the university
      integration_course - if he has integration course certificate
      dsh_course - if he has DSH certificate
      german_level - what is his German level
      roleType - if the new user Manager, Worker, Customer or volunteer

    • sqlUploadDocumentByManager

      public static void sqlUploadDocumentByManager​(java.lang.String document_name, java.lang.String document_upload_date, java.lang.String document_language, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String data, java.lang.String document_for_user, java.lang.String prefix, java.lang.String path) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Resposne about save the uploaded File to the DB
      Parameters:
      document_name - the name od the document
      document_upload_date - the uploaded date
      document_language - the language of the document
      type - the type of the document (Public, Private, For User)
      data - Blob of the Document
      document_for_user - the id of the user if the document was belong to him
      prefix - the prefix of the uploaded document
      path - the path where the document has been saved
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • sqlEditEventByManager

      public static java.lang.String sqlEditEventByManager​(java.lang.String event_id, java.lang.String created_by_user_id, java.lang.String event_type, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String date, java.lang.String startTime, java.lang.String endTime, java.lang.String location) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Response about edit created Event
      Parameters:
      event_id - te id of the event which is going to be edited
      created_by_user_id - by who has the event been created
      event_type - the type of the event (Public, private, For User)
      title - the name of the new Event
      date - the new date of the event
      startTime - the start time of the event
      endTime - the end time of the event
      location - the location of the new event
      Returns:
      the calendarID which the vent belongs to
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • sqlUserAppointmentBooking

      public static java.lang.String sqlUserAppointmentBooking​(java.lang.String created_by_user_id, java.lang.String for_user_id, java.lang.String event_type, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String date, java.lang.String startTime, java.lang.String endTime, java.lang.String location) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Response about Booking an appointment from the Customer
      Parameters:
      created_by_user_id - The ID of the user who create the event
      for_user_id - the ID of the User
      event_type - Public, Private, For User
      title - The name of the new User
      date - the Date of the new Event
      startTime - The start time of the event
      endTime - the end time of the event
      location - the location of the vent
      Returns:
      the calendar_id which the event belongs to
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException
